about_the_game:
The GOLD STANDARD of Video Games
Fight inflation the right way: by destroying the tools the Federal Reserve uses to manipulate the money supply! Play as libertarian luminaries such as Tom Woods, Michael Malice, Ron Paul, Dave Smith, or Murray Rothbard in your quest to destroy fiat currency and get the high score in this tricky bullet hell shoot-em-up!

Arm Yourself with Specie Guns

  • The Golden Gun
  • Golden Deagle
  • Golden Uzi
  • Golden AK-47
  • Golden Barrett M82 .50 cal
Unleash Unique Overpowered Abilities

  • Tom Woods: 3x5 Index Card
  • Michael Malice: Spite Fund
  • Ron Paul: Revolution
  • Dave Smith: Legion of Skanks
  • Murray Rothbard: Human Action
Unlock New Looks for All Characters

I'd tell you all the unlock codes, but that would take all the fun out of it. But DM me your highscores on Twitter @WreckTheFed and I might spoonfeed you a couple.

Acknowledgements

Loosely based on a passing reference the Dangerous Documentaries video "The Politically Incorrect Guide to Real American Heroes"

name: Wreck the Fed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None

short_description: Fight inflation the American way: by shooting it in the face. Play as your favorite libertarians and destroy the Federal Reserve's control over our money!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
